title: Wonder Luxury manicure
description: A Wonder Exclusive - this is the ultimate manicure experience, delivered exclusively by our most experienced therapists. Featuring luxurious skincare products including sand scrub , shaping, buffing, cuticle care, moisturising, a luxury hot cream treatment and an indulgent 20 minutes of massage. This is all finished with a full colour consultation and your choice of a clear strengthening treatment, gel or polish .
